de.affect.manage

Class AppraisalManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.affect.manage.AppraisalManager
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    AffectManager

    public class AppraisalManager
extends java.lang.Object
    The class AppraisalManager contains methods for appraising relevant input for affect generation. This code relys on the xml bean classes created with xmlbeans v1.3 from the Affect.xsd schema, which is part of this distribution.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Patrick Gebhard
